feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -26.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 09:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -26.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 50 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -33.6°C
Wind: W 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
